verses.verse: Moreover <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H6213>kept<s%> a <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and they <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> on the <S%H702%H6240>fourteenth<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>.
And he <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> in their <S%H4931>charges<s%>, and <S%H2388>encouraged<s%> them to the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that <S%H995%H4000>taught<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which were <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H5414>Put<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H727>ark<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H1129>build<s%>; it shall not be a <S%H4853>burden<s%> upon your <S%H3802>shoulders<s%>: <S%H5647>serve<s%> now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

And <S%H3559%H3559>prepare<s%> yourselves by the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, after your <S%H4256>courses<s%>, according to the <S%H3791>writing<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and according to the <S%H4385>writing<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And stand <S%H5975>in<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place according to the <S%H6391>divisions<s%> of the <S%H1004>families<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121%H5971>people<s%>, and after the <S%H2515>division<s%> of the <S%H1%H1004>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>.

So <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> yourselves, and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%>, that they may <S%H6213>do<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H7311>gave<s%> to the <S%H1121%H5971>people<s%>, of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, <S%H3532>lambs<s%> and <S%H1121%H5795>kids<s%>, all for the passover <S%H6453>offerings<s%>, for all that were <S%H4672>present<s%>, to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1241>bullocks<s%>: these were of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H7399>substance<s%>.

And his <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H7311>gave<s%> <S%H5071>willingly<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, to the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel<s%>, <S%H5057>rulers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priests<s%> for the passover <S%H6453>offerings<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> small cattle, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%>.

<S%H3562>Conaniah<s%> also, and <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> and <S%H5417>Nethaneel<s%>, his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%> and <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%> and <S%H3107>Jozabad<s%>, <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, <S%H7311>gave<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> for passover <S%H6453>offerings<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> small cattle, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%>.

So the <S%H5656>service<s%> was <S%H3559>prepared<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in their <S%H5977>place<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in their <S%H4256>courses<s%>, according to the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4687>commandment<s%>.

And they <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the blood from their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6584>flayed<s%> them.

And they <S%H5493>removed<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, that they might <S%H5414>give<s%> according to the <S%H4653>divisions<s%> of the <S%H1%H1004>families<s%> of the <S%H1121%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>. And so did they with the <S%H1241>oxen<s%>.

And they <S%H1310>roasted<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%>: but the other <S%H6944>holy<s%> offerings <S%H1310>sod<s%> they in <S%H5518>pots<s%>, and in <S%H1731>caldrons<s%>, and in <S%H6745>pans<s%>, and divided them <S%H7323>speedily<s%> among all the <S%H1121%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> they made <S%H3559>ready<s%> for themselves, and for the <S%H3548>priests<s%>: because the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> were busied in <S%H5927>offering<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> until <S%H3915>night<s%>; therefore the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for themselves, and for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>.

And the <S%H7891>singers<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%> were in their <S%H4612>place<s%>, according to the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, and <S%H1968>Heman<s%>, and <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H2374>seer<s%>; and the <S%H7778>porters<s%> waited at every <S%H8179>gate<s%>; they might not <S%H5493>depart<s%> from their <S%H5656>service<s%>; for their <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for them.

So all the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H3559>prepared<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%>, to <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%>, and to <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, according to the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were <S%H4672>present<s%> <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And there was no <S%H6453>passover<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> to that <S%H6213>kept<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>; neither <S%H6213>did<s%> all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>keep<s%> such a <S%H6453>passover<s%> as <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H6213>kept<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were <S%H4672>present<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
In the <S%H8083%H6240>eighteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> was this <S%H6453>passover<s%> <S%H6213>kept<s%>.

¶ <S%H310>After<s%> all this, when <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> the <S%H1004>temple<s%>, <S%H5224>Necho<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3751>Carchemish<s%> by <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>: and <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> him.

But he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>ambassadors<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What have I to do with thee, thou <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>? I come not against thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, but against the <S%H1004>house<s%> wherewith I have <S%H4421>war<s%>: for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> me to make <S%H926>haste<s%>: <S%H2308>forbear<s%> thee from meddling with <S%H430>God<s%>, who is with me, that he <S%H7843>destroy<s%> thee not.

Nevertheless <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> would not <S%H5437>turn<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> from him, but <S%H2664>disguised<s%> himself, that he might <S%H3898>fight<s%> with him, and <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H5224>Necho<s%> from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%>.

And the <S%H3384>archers<s%> <S%H3384>shot<s%> at <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>; and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, Have me <S%H5674>away<s%>; for I am <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H2470>wounded<s%>.

His <S%H5650>servants<s%> therefore <S%H5674>took<s%> him out of that <S%H4818>chariot<s%>, and <S%H7392>put<s%> him in the <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H7393>chariot<s%> that he had; and they <S%H3212>brought<s%> him to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and he <S%H4191>died<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in one of the <S%H6913>sepulchres<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%>. And all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> for <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>.

¶ And <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H6969>lamented<s%> for <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>: and all the singing <S%H7891>men<s%> and the singing <S%H7891>women<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> in their <S%H7015>lamentations<s%> to this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H5414>made<s%> them an <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and, behold, they are <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H7015>lamentations<s%>.

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, and his <S%H2617>goodness<s%>, according to that which was <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>,

And his <S%H1697>deeds<s%>, <S%H7223>first<s%> and <S%H314>last<s%>, behold, they are <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
